name: Custom Features for WooCommerce
author: Md. Amdadul Haque

sections.description:
Sometimes WooCommerce default features may be not fulfill your requirements, So you can use Custom Features for WooCommerce plugin to
get some extra features like as bellow.

  • When your store is not available for delivery, you can set your store as close mode.
  • Cart data will be automatically updated when product quantity is change.
sections.installation: After login as administrator, go to Plugin > Add New.
sections.faq:
How to setup store as close?

After install and activate Custom Features for WooCommerce go to Custom Features for WooCommerce > Store close > Setup all field.

How to setup cart data automatically updated when product quantity is change?

After install and activate Custom Features for WooCommerce go to Custom Features for WooCommerce > Cart auto update > choose Yes.

short_description: A plugin of some custom features for your WooCommerce site.
description:
Sometimes WooCommerce default features may be not fulfill your requirements, So you can use Custom Features for WooCommerce plugin to

  • Cart data will be automatically updated when product quantity is change.

upgrade_notice.1.0: This is initial release so no upgrade!.
